verses.verse: He that dwelleth <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the secret <S%H5643><s%> place of Ha `Elyon <S%H5945><s%> shall abide <S%H3885><s%> <S%H8698><s%> under the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of 'El SHaddai <S%H7706><s%>.
I will say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, He is my refuge <S%H4268><s%> and my fortress <S%H4686><s%>: my 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>; in him will I trust <S%H982><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
Surely he shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee from the snare <S%H6341><s%> of the fowler <S%H3353><s%>, and from the noisome <S%H1942><s%> pestilence <S%H1698><s%>.

He shall cover <S%H5526><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee with his feathers <S%H84><s%>, and under his wings <S%H3671><s%> shalt thou trust <S%H2620><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: his truth <S%H571><s%> shall be thy shield <S%H6793><s%> and buckler <S%H5507><s%>.
Thou shalt not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for the terror <S%H6343><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>; nor for the arrow <S%H2671><s%> that flieth <S%H5774><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%>;

Nor for the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> that walketh <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in darkness <S%H652><s%>; nor for the destruction <S%H6986><s%> that wasteth <S%H7736><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at noonday <S%H6672><s%>.

A thousand <S%H505><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at thy side <S%H6654><s%>, and ten thousand <S%H7233><s%> at thy right hand <S%H3225><s%>; but it shall not come nigh <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee.
Only with thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> shalt thou behold <S%H5027><s%> <S%H8686><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the reward <S%H8011><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.
Because thou hast made <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, which is my refuge <S%H4268><s%>, even Ha `Elyon <S%H5945><s%>, thy habitation <S%H4583><s%>;
There shall no evil <S%H7451><s%> befall <S%H579><s%> <S%H8792><s%> thee, neither shall any plague <S%H5061><s%> come nigh <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy dwelling <S%H168><s%>.
For he shall give his angels <S%H4397><s%> charge <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> over thee, to keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thee in all thy ways <S%H1870><s%>.
They shall bear thee up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in their hands <S%H3709><s%>, lest thou dash <S%H5062><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy foot <S%H7272><s%> against a stone <S%H68><s%>.

Thou shalt tread <S%H1869><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon the lion <S%H7826><s%> and adder <S%H6620><s%>: the young lion <S%H3715><s%> and the dragon <S%H8577><s%> shalt thou trample under feet <S%H7429><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Because he hath set his love <S%H2836><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon me, therefore will I deliver <S%H6403><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him: I will set him on high <S%H7682><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, because he hath known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%>.

He shall call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon me, and I will answer <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him: I will be with him in trouble <S%H6869><s%>; I will deliver <S%H2502><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him, and honour <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him.
With long <S%H753><s%> life <S%H3117><s%> will I satisfy <S%H7646><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him, and shew <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him my salvation <S%H3444><s%>.
